Y&R Day Ahead Recap: Hilary’s latest move leads Devon to a realization 
Candace Young Tuesday, February 21st, 2017 
Wednesday February 22, 2017: Jill has flashbacks, Colin is unable to raise funds, and Cane’s actions upset Billy. Pin 
Victoria is at GC Buzz for the Brash & Sassy interview and helps Mariah position the products while wondering about Cane and the rest of her team. Nearby, Devon urges Lily to stop stressing about Hilary. Meanwhile, Jordan talks to Hilary about how good it is to work with Lily again after ten years. Hilary gets a knowing look. “I’ll bet it is.” After, Hilary wants Devon to sign off on changes to the script. 
In the hospital, Jill urges Billy to go to work and he acknowledges he’s hanging around to keep Colin at bay. Jill is irked. They debate about whether Colin sees her as a meal ticket. Jill has things she wants to talk to her husband about, and becomes upset at Billy asking the nurses to keep Colin from seeing her. Billy advises her to get some rest. “I love you.” Jill doesn’t respond. After, Jill sleeps fitfully as she flashes to arguing with Colin, and to Katherine confronting him about his shortcomings when she was alive. She recalls Katherine slapping her when she insulted Murphy and flinches. She awakens missing Katherine and dials her phone. 
More: Y&R alum Adam Lazarre-White (Nathan) in The Choir Director 
At the Club, Cane warns Colin to stay away from Jill or Billy will have him arrested. Colin feels his marriage may survive if he can make things right. “And you’re going to help me.” Cane realizes Colin wants him to go to Devon and says his brother-in-law is not a bank. Colin sighs. He will have to try and explain things to Jill. Cane is insulted that Colin didn’t even acknowledge it’s a big day for him and Lily. After, Neil finds Colin at the bar and asks about the situation with Jill. He also refuses to ask Devon to loan Colin money. Colin tells Neil he can’t lose Jill. Neil notes he could have left town, so he must love her. Neil advises him to prove it by being the man she fell in love with. 
Cane arrives at GC Buzz and notices Jordan. Victoria informs him he’s taking behind-the-scenes shots and informs him she’s thinking of hiring him exclusively for Brash & Sassy. When Cane requests a GC Buzz employee add chairs for him and Billy, Victoria says it will just be her and Lily. Cane is questioning her when Billy appears to remind him he’s not co-CEO anymore. Devon takes Cane aside to ask about Jill. He heard about Colin’s role in it as well. Cane assures him he told Colin not to ask him for money, but insists he loves Jill. Cane finds Lily to wish her luck and Hilary looks on as they embrace. GC Buzz goes on the air, and Hilary interrupts Lily talking up the products to comment on her history with Jordan. She then invites Lily’s husband to join Jordan on the air. Cane takes off his shirt and Lily sprays him with Dare. Jordan removes his shirt and Mariah sprays him with scent. Devon and Billy take in the new developments with amazement. The show wraps and Billy confronts Cane for selling himself. He tells Vikki he deliberately tried to steal the segment from her. Victoria is just pleased it was successful. Devon announces social media is lighting up. Hilary thinks Jordan’s abs had a lot to do with that. Devon seems put out. After, he tells Hil she did a great job today. Devon admits her flirting with Jordan made him realize he dislikes the idea of her moving on, and he is miserable without her. They kiss. 
Related: Y&R casts Laur Allen as Brash & Sassy consultant 
At Crimson Lights, Billy is still irked about Cane. Victoria admits she wanted her star time as CEO, but the spontaneous fun made it a big hit. Billy warns her not to continue letting Cane get away with this stuff. Talk turns to Colin. Billy believes Cane would also do anything to get what he wants, just like his father. 
Cane and Lily arrive at home and canoodle. Lily thinks Victoria and Billy will see his worth now, but Cane feels they want his life to be misery. Lily teases that the brand ambassador has a crush on him. They start undressing and Cane carries to her the bedroom.
